headline: Three Reasons Why KDP is Risky and One Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper currently trades at $30.68 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a small loss of 5%. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 6.3% gain during that period.
